DataElement.preferredName: End Time of PK Sample Collection
DataElement.preferredDefinition: The end time of the specimen collection represented in an unambiguous time format (e.g., hh:mm:ss).

DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: A subject domain utilized for the submission of information encompassing and representing data, vocabulary or records related to pharmacokinetic concentration._The time when an event has ceased.

ReferenceDocuments.name: What was the specimen collect
ReferenceDocuments.description: What was the specimen collection end time?

ReferenceDocuments.name: Case Report Form
ReferenceDocuments.description: Record end time of collection (as complete as possible).

ReferenceDocuments.name: PCENDTC
ReferenceDocuments.description: This does not map directly to an SDTMIG variable. For the SDTM submission dataset, concatenate all collected CDASH END DATE and TIME components and populate the SDTMIG variable PCENDTC in ISO 8601 format.

ReferenceDocuments.name: CDASH Implementation Notes
ReferenceDocuments.description: A complete end time is expected. The SDTMIG variable PCENDTC variable contains the end date/time, when a specimen is collected over time. If there is no end date/time, the SDTMIG variable PCENDTC should be Null.

DataElement.changeDescription: 2021-6-11 ak Released per governance approval. Created as part of the CDISC mapping task_ghd_08.22.18
